snippet: The Paly Entrepreneurs Club in Palo Alto, Calif., meets to discuss members’ ventures and ideas and to explore matters like money-raising and new markets.
abstract: Paly Entrepreneurs Club in Palo Alto, Calif, an extracurricular group at the local high school, meets to discuss members’ ventures and ideas and to explore matters like money-raising and new markets.
lead_paragraph: The Paly Entrepreneurs Club in Palo Alto, Calif., meets to discuss members’ ventures and ideas and to explore matters like money-raising and new markets.

headline.seo: Palo Alto High School Club Fosters Would-Be Tech Moguls
headline.main: Doing Apps and Start-Ups While Still in High School
headline.print_headline: Doing Apps and Start-Ups While Still in High School
